summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered. It includes billing information, service details, and payment instructions. The invoice highlights multiple shipments and their respective charges, indicating the sender and recipients involved.

persons.name: Lauren Kwintner
persons.context: Lauren Kwintner is listed as the sender for multiple FedEx shipments detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Paul Burkhardt
persons.context: Paul Burkhardt is mentioned as a recipient for one of the shipments, with an address in New Albany, Ohio.

persons.name: Peter H. Beim
persons.context: Peter H. Beim is mentioned as a recipient for another shipment, with an address in Carlstadt, New Jersey.

persons.name: D. Sutton
persons.context: D. Sutton is noted as the individual who signed for one of the deliveries.

persons.name: Carrie Tillman
persons.context: Carrie Tillman is mentioned as a recipient for one of the shipments, with an address in Wilmington, Delaware.

events.title: Pickup of Shipment

events.title: Delivery of Shipment

events.title: Delivery of Shipment
events.description: Additional shipments were delivered on this date.

locations: 6525 West Campus Oval, New Albany, OH 43054
keyFacts: The invoice is dated February 22, 2002, and includes multiple shipments.
Lauren Kwintner is the sender for all shipments listed in the invoice.
The total charges for the services rendered amount to $16.74.
Shipments were picked up on February 11 and delivered on February 12 and 13, 2002.
Several recipients are named, including Paul Burkhardt, Peter H. Beim, D. Sutton, and Carrie Tillman.
